display_long_description:
**Performance & Payroll**  
As the boss, your main job is to assign KPIs and pay your employees. Review the employee profiles displayed on your iPad and mark ✅ or ❌ to determine their performance and salary. Use a variety of fun and flashy  items to spice things up and trigger hilarious employee reactions. And yes — you can even stash their paychecks into your personal little vault.
[media]
**ITEMS**  
Head to the store to purchase new items 💣 and make the game even more exciting! These items will bring you fresh experiences and unexpected fun. Enjoy the chaos!!!
[media]
**LCK Recording Tool**  
Built-in camera system🎥 designed to meet players’ creative needs, offering multiple viewing angles.  
**Updates Mode & Community**  
"Office" Mode and "Bank" Mode is deving — both completely free! If you have any suggestions or questions, feel free to join our Discord community 👉: https://discord.com/invite/qFH62yNHV9
